sledgehammer

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends Printable
    Class to load and manage the settings for the Sledgehammer engine.
    Author:
    Jab

      • getMaximumExplosionRadius

        public int getMaximumExplosionRadius()
        Returns:
        Returns the maximum radius an explosion is allowed for a server. Anything above this limit is registered is cancelled, and invokes a CheaterEvent.

        public static Settings getInstance()
